description.demagnetize.demagnetizer.1: Demagnetizers prevent item magnets from various mods from picking up items around them.
description.demagnetize.demagnetizer.2: They can be filtered or redstone controlled.
description.demagnetize.demagnetizer.3: The Advanced Demagnetizer has a larger range and more filter slots.
tooltip.demagnetize.configured: Configured, drop in water to clear
